protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the specific attachment of an amino acid to its cognate tRNA in a 2 step reaction: the amino acid (AA) is first activated by ATP to form AA-AMP and then transferred to the acceptor end of the tRNA.

go_class.description: ligase activity, forming aminoacyl-trna and related compounds
